entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
